function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of public health and safety infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health crises","Mitigation":"Investment in public health care and infrastructure","Technologies":"Smart city solutions, architecture and urbanism solutions","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, city planners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Poor urban design and architecture contributing to disease propagation","Impact":"Higher mortality rates and spread of disease","Mitigation":"Implementation of architecture and urbanism solutions for disease control and prevention","Technologies":"Hygiene solutions, ventilation and air control, social interaction solutions","People":"Residents, workers in urban environments","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, city developers"},{"Description":"Impact of crises on sustainable development","Impact":"Slow progress in sustainable development and housing initiatives","Mitigation":"Focus on sustainable construction and development, investment in sustainable economy","Technologies":"Smart city solutions, sustainable construction practices","People":"Communities in crisis-hit economies","Owner":"Government, housing authorities, sustainable development organizations"}]}
